name: Peverell
description: A legendary wizarding family. The three Peverell brothers were the original owners of the Deathly Hallows. Harry Potter is descended from Ignotus Peverell.

name: Black
description: An ancient pure-blood family known for its strict beliefs in blood purity. Sirius Black, a member of the Order of the Phoenix, rejected these ideals.

name: Bones
description: A respected wizarding family. Amelia Bones was head of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement and known for her integrity and bravery.

name: Crouch
description: A powerful family involved in politics. Barty Crouch Sr. was a Ministry official; his son Barty Crouch Jr. became a loyal Death Eater.

name: Diggory
description: A noble and loyal wizarding family. Cedric Diggory was a popular and talented Hogwarts student who was tragically killed by Voldemort.

name: Gaunt
description: A decaying pure-blood family descended from Salazar Slytherin. The Gaunts were known for instability and dark magic; Voldemort was born from this line.

name: Longbottom
description: A courageous wizarding family. Neville Longbottom, a key figure in the resistance against Voldemort, is known for his bravery and growth.

name: Malfoy
description: A wealthy pure-blood family closely tied to dark magic and the Death Eaters. Draco Malfoy was a school rival of Harry Potter.

name: Potter
description: A well-known wizarding family. James and Lily Potter died protecting their son Harry, who became the Chosen One destined to defeat Voldemort.

name: Weasley
description: A large, loving pure-blood family known for their kindness, courage, and loyalty. The Weasleys played a central role in the fight against Voldemort.

name: Dursley
description: A Muggle family related to Harry Potter through his aunt Petunia. They disapproved of magic and treated Harry poorly during his childhood.

name: Dumbledore
description: A powerful and influential wizarding family. Albus Dumbledore, one of the most respected wizards in history, was its most famous member.
